title: Looking for an ADC Main in Gold/Plat :)
body:
Heya, support main and mid main here! :) Looking for a duo partner to  help climb to platinum with, currently gold 1 :D. Add me in game if keen please :D, IGN: Skyla

P.S, The L in skyla is a capital i ;)

replies.body: hey yeh ur friends list is full?
